content: materials 18 skeins of purl soho s gentle giant 1 100% merino wool each skein is 48 yards/ 125 grams - contrast colors 12 skeins in 12 colors approximately 10 yards required per color - main color 6 skeins approximately 270 yards required you ll also need… - a size q 15 mm crochet hook 2 size - finished dimensions of each square 10 x 10 inches - finished dimensions of the blanket 30 x 40 inches gauge each finished granny square should measure 10 x 10 inches if yours is smaller try a bigger hook and if yours is bigger try a smaller one samples we knit up our samples in the following inspiring color palettes note some colors may no longer be available - contrast colors orange koi clay pot cowrie pink honey amber parakeet yellow super yellow sugar maple super pink rose violet purple lupine iceberg blue mint ice - main color heirloom white - contrast colors clay pot orange koi cowrie pink calico pink wolf brown and winter bark silver mauve purple lupine elephant gray pigeon gray iceberg blue and mint ice - main color heirloom white for more inspiration visit our original post 3 and our 2017 update 4 1 https //www purlsoho com/gentle-giant html 2 https //www purlsoho com/size-p-and-q-crochet-hooks html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/2016/11/19/granny-square-blanket-in-gentle-giant/ 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/2017/11/17/gentle-giant-blankets-in-new-colors/
